message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial to you. I'm asking for $13,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $11,500?

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $11,500 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm really interested in this product, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle.
